advisor.name: Dr. Ronni Kurtzhals
advisor.bio: Dr. Kurtzhals is a professor in the Computer Science & Information Systems department at MSUM, providing guidance and support to the ACM student organization.

members.name: Laween Al-Sulaivany
members.bio: Laween is a dedicated computer science student with a passion for software development and a strong commitment to the ACM community.

members.name: James Zook
members.bio: CyberSecurity and Comp Sci. Major. Born and raised in ND so I hope you don't judge me. Love to help and learn alongside people. :)

members.name: Sebastian Hanson
members.bio: Sebastian is the treasurer of ACM, managing finances and ensuring the club's resources are well allocated.

members.name: Zach Moore
members.bio: Zach is the webmaster of ACM, responsible for maintaining the club's website and online presence.

members.name: Donovan Morse
members.bio: Donovan is the secretary of ACM, known for his Minecraft skills and passion for space exploration.

members.name: Jacelynne Stachovich
members.bio: Jacelynne is a creative marketer with a major in Criminal Justice & Psychology, and a passion for promoting ACM events and engaging the community.
